@[simp]
theorem uncurry_curry (f : A ‚äó X ‚ü∂ Y) : uncurry (curry f) = f :=

name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.curry_eq_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u

inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Closed A

g : Quiver.Hom Y ((CategoryTheory.ihom A).obj X)
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.curry f) g) (Eq f (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.uncurry g))
decl:
theorem curry_eq_iff (f : A ‚äó Y ‚ü∂ X) (g : Y ‚ü∂ A ‚ü∂[C] X) : curry f = g ‚Üî f = uncurry g :=
  Adjunction.homEquiv_apply_eq (ihom.adjunction A) f g

name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.eq_curry_iff
initialProofState:

g : Quiver.Hom Y ((CategoryTheory.ihom A).obj X)
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq g (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.curry f)) (Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.uncurry g) f)
decl:
theorem eq_curry_iff (f : A ‚äó Y ‚ü∂ X) (g : Y ‚ü∂ A ‚ü∂[C] X) : g = curry f ‚Üî uncurry g = f :=
  Adjunction.eq_homEquiv_apply (ihom.adjunction A) f g

theorem uncurry_eq (g : Y ‚ü∂ A ‚ü∂[C] X) : uncurry g = (A ‚óÅ g) ‚â´ (ihom.ev A).app X := by

name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.ofEquiv_curry_def
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù‚Å∂ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
G : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
adj : CategoryTheory.Adjunction F G
inst‚úù¬≤ : F.Monoidal
inst‚úù¬π : F.IsEquivalence
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed D
X Y Z : C
f : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj X Y) Z
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.curry f) ((adj.homEquiv Y ((CategoryTheory.ihom (F.obj X)).obj (F.obj Z))) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.curry ((adj.toEquivalence.symm.toAdjunction.homEquiv (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj (F.obj X) (F.obj Y)) Z) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.Functor.Monoidal.commTensorLeft F X).compInverseIso.hom.app Y) f))))
decl:
/-- Suppose we have a monoidal equivalence `F : C ‚âå D`, with `D` monoidal closed. We can pull the
monoidal closed instance back along the equivalence. For `X, Y, Z : C`, this lemma describes the
resulting currying map `Hom(X ‚äó Y, Z) ‚Üí Hom(Y, (X ‚ü∂[C] Z))`. (`X ‚ü∂[C] Z` is defined to be
`F‚Åª¬π(F(X) ‚ü∂[D] F(Z))`, so currying in `C` is given by essentially conjugating currying in
`D` by `F.`) -/
theorem ofEquiv_curry_def {X Y Z : C} (f : X ‚äó Y ‚ü∂ Z) :
    letI := ofEquiv F adj
    MonoidalClosed.curry f =
      adj.homEquiv Y ((ihom (F.obj X)).obj (F.obj Z))
        (MonoidalClosed.curry (adj.toEquivalence.symm.toAdjunction.homEquiv (F.obj X ‚äó F.obj Y) Z
        ((Iso.compInverseIso (H := adj.toEquivalence)
          (Functor.Monoidal.commTensorLeft F X)).hom.app Y ‚â´ f))) := by
  -- This whole proof used to be `rfl` before https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16317.
  change ((adj.comp ((ihom.adjunction (F.obj X)).comp
      adj.toEquivalence.symm.toAdjunction)).ofNatIsoLeft _).homEquiv _ _ _ = _
  dsimp only [Adjunction.ofNatIsoLeft]
  rw [Adjunction.mkOfHomEquiv_homEquiv]
  dsimp
  rw [Adjunction.comp_homEquiv, Adjunction.comp_homEquiv]
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.ofEquiv_uncurry_def
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù‚Å∂ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
G : CategoryTheory.Functor D C
adj : CategoryTheory.Adjunction F G
inst‚úù¬≤ : F.Monoidal
inst‚úù¬π : F.IsEquivalence
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed D
X Y Z : C
f : Quiver.Hom Y ((CategoryTheory.ihom X).obj Z)
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.uncurry f) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.Functor.Monoidal.commTensorLeft F X).compInverseIso.inv.app Y) ((adj.toEquivalence.symm.toAdjunction.homEquiv ((F.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory.tensorLeft (F.obj X))).obj Y) Z).symm (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.uncurry ((adj.homEquiv Y ((CategoryTheory.ihom (F.obj X)).obj (adj.toEquivalence.symm.inverse.obj Z))).symm f))))
decl:
/-- Suppose we have a monoidal equivalence `F : C ‚âå D`, with `D` monoidal closed. We can pull the
monoidal closed instance back along the equivalence. For `X, Y, Z : C`, this lemma describes the
resulting uncurrying map `Hom(Y, (X ‚ü∂[C] Z)) ‚Üí Hom(X ‚äó Y ‚ü∂ Z)`. (`X ‚ü∂[C] Z` is
defined to be `F‚Åª¬π(F(X) ‚ü∂[D] F(Z))`, so uncurrying in `C` is given by essentially conjugating
uncurrying in `D` by `F.`) -/
theorem ofEquiv_uncurry_def {X Y Z : C} :
    letI := ofEquiv F adj
    ‚àÄ (f : Y ‚ü∂ (ihom X).obj Z), MonoidalClosed.uncurry f =
      ((Iso.compInverseIso (H := adj.toEquivalence)
          (Functor.Monoidal.commTensorLeft F X)).inv.app Y) ‚â´
            (adj.toEquivalence.symm.toAdjunction.homEquiv _ _).symm
              (MonoidalClosed.uncurry ((adj.homEquiv _ _).symm f)) := by
  intro f
  -- This whole proof used to be `rfl` before https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16317.
  change (((adj.comp ((ihom.adjunction (F.obj X)).comp
      adj.toEquivalence.symm.toAdjunction)).ofNatIsoLeft _).homEquiv _ _).symm _ = _
  dsimp only [Adjunction.ofNatIsoLeft]
  rw [Adjunction.mkOfHomEquiv_homEquiv]
  dsimp
  rw [Adjunction.comp_homEquiv, Adjunction.comp_homEquiv]
  rfl

lemma assoc (w x y z : C) [Closed w] [Closed x] [Closed y] :

  apply uncurry_injective
  simp only [uncurry_natural_left, comp_eq]
  rw [uncurry_curry, uncurry_curry]; simp only [compTranspose_eq, Category.assoc]
  rw [associator_inv_naturality_middle_assoc, ‚Üê comp_whiskerRight_assoc]; dsimp
  rw [‚Üê uncurry_eq, uncurry_curry, associator_inv_naturality_right_assoc, whisker_exchange_assoc,
    ‚Üê uncurry_eq, uncurry_curry]
  simp only [comp_whiskerRight, tensorLeft_obj, Category.assoc, pentagon_inv_assoc,
    whiskerRight_tensor, Iso.hom_inv_id_assoc]

name: CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.assoc_assoc
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
w x y z : C
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Closed w
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Closed x
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Closed y
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom ((CategoryTheory.ihom w).obj z) Z
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator ((CategoryTheory.ihom w).obj x) ((CategoryTheory.ihom x).obj y) ((CategoryTheory.ihom y).obj z)).inv (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerRight (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.comp w x y) ((CategoryTheory.ihom y).obj z)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.comp w y z) h))) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerLeft ((CategoryTheory.ihom w).obj x) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.comp x y z)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalClosed.comp w x z) h))
decl:
/-- Associativity of the enriched structure -/
@[reassoc]
lemma assoc (w x y z : C) [Closed w] [Closed x] [Closed y] :
    (Œ±_ _ _ _).inv ‚â´ comp w x y ‚ñ∑ _ ‚â´ comp w y z = _ ‚óÅ comp x y z ‚â´ comp w x z := by
  apply uncurry_injective
  simp only [uncurry_natural_left, comp_eq]
  rw [uncurry_curry, uncurry_curry]; simp only [compTranspose_eq, Category.assoc]
  rw [associator_inv_naturality_middle_assoc, ‚Üê comp_whiskerRight_assoc]; dsimp
  rw [‚Üê uncurry_eq, uncurry_curry, associator_inv_naturality_right_assoc, whisker_exchange_assoc,
    ‚Üê uncurry_eq, uncurry_curry]
  simp only [comp_whiskerRight, tensorLeft_obj, Category.assoc, pentagon_inv_assoc,
    whiskerRight_tensor, Iso.hom_inv_id_assoc]
